Three-point charter of Korea's reunification favored

articles.content:
Three-point charter of Korea's reunification favored 
     Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The leader of the People's National Congress Party of Guyana signed the signature paper on July 3 to support the three-point charter of Korea's reunification.
